thread.title: Manchester United's Henrikh Mkhitaryan a doubt for EFL Cup final after limping out of St Etienne clash
thread.title_full: Manchester United's Henrikh Mkhitaryan a doubt for EFL Cup final after limping out of St Etienne clash

author: Liam Prenderville
title: Manchester United's Henrikh Mkhitaryan a doubt for EFL Cup final after limping out of St Etienne clash
text:
Sport Manchester United's Henrikh Mkhitaryan a doubt for EFL Cup final after limping out of St Etienne clash The Armenian had given United the lead in the Europa League second leg with a clever finish but was replaced by Marcus Rashford Share Manchester United's Henrikh Mkhitaryan goes off injured (Photo: REUTERS) Share     
Manchester United could be without Henrikh Mkhitaryan for Sunday's EFL Cup final. 
The Armenian had given United the lead against St Etienne in the Europa League second leg with a near-post finish.. 
But he was withdrawn after just 25 minutes and held the back of his right leg as he made his way off. 
Marcus Rashford replaced the midfielder in France and would likely battle with Anthony Martial for a starting spot at Wembley, should Mkhitaryan not make it. 
United take on Southampton in the EFL Cup final this weekend. Mkhitaryan gives United the lead (Photo: Getty Images) Marcus Rashford replaces Henrikh Mkhitaryan (Photo: REUTERS) 
Jose Mourinho named a strong side for the second leg with St Etienne despite leading 3-0 from the opener. 
Michael Carrick was also withdrawn during the second-half after appearing to pick up a knock. 
Wayne Rooney did not travel to France and could also miss out on Sunday's final. poll loading Who will win the EFL Cup? 0+ VOTES SO FAR
